name: type-enforcer-test-helper
description: Test data and helper functions for type-enforcer and addons

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && del /f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run docs && git add --all && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Updating docs"
scripts.deps-commit: npm run deps && git add --all && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Updating dependencies"
scripts.deps-patch: npm run deps-commit && npm run patch
scripts.docs:main: exec-each --out docs/{basefile}.md src/*.js jsdoc2md -- {path} -t node_modules/dmd-readable/docs.hbs --plugin dmd-readable
scripts.docs:data: exec-each --out docs/{basefile}.md src/data/*.js jsdoc2md -- {path} -t node_modules/dmd-readable/docs.hbs --plugin dmd-readable

author: Darren Paul Wright <Darren@DarrenPaulWright.com>
